rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural lighting and a small foyer area to greet guests.
Spacious living room designed in Bohemian style with open concept seating areas and large windows for natural light. Features a balcony overlooking the garden.
A cozy dining area adjacent to the living room, incorporating Bohemian d√©cor elements and comfortable seating.
Modern kitchen layout with ample counter space and storage. Incorporates Vastu principles by positioning utilities in the North-West corner.
Comfortable guest bedroom featuring Bohemian design accents and a private balcony for fresh air.
A dedicated study area that blends functional design with creative Bohemian elements. Good natural lighting is ensured via east-facing windows.

openings.description: South facing entrance ensuring proper Vastu alignment with a welcome pathway leading into the house.
Balcony adjacent to living room for garden view and additional space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom and a balcony. Designed in Bohemian style with rich textures and vibrant decor.
Additional bedroom for family use featuring Vastu-aligned placement with east or north facing windows for positive energy.
Modern en-suite bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with ample storage and thoughtful design for privacy.

openings.description: Secure staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor, located in a central area of the house for ease of movement.

rooms.description: Large garden area with landscaped patio and relaxation zones. Features an outdoor seating area, a water feature to promote positive Vastu energy, and space for organic gardening.

openings.description: Dedicated entry point from the house into the expansive garden, promoting a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living spaces.
